title: My game constantly comes up with error messages.
body: My game crashes every time I load it up. It then spams error msg's forever and to get out of it I need to go to Task Manager and close all error messages.

replies.body: We've seen a few reports, and the culprit looks to be using Discord Overlay.  Disabling that should fix it up!
Run the game as admin, that worked for me
Close discord overlay worked for me!
